tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_expenditure_class CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_expenditure_class AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, v.name, COALESCE(v.id, -999999999) AS id, v.terms_assist_id, v.financing_instrument_id, v.donor_org_id, v.mode_of_payment_id, v.funding_status_id, v.agreement_id, v.funding_id FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT af.amp_activity_id, acv.category_value AS name, acv.id, af.type_of_assistance_category_va as terms_assist_id, af.financing_instr_category_value as financing_instrument_id, af.amp_donor_org_id as donor_org_id, af.mode_of_payment_category_va as mode_of_payment_id, af.funding_status_category_va as funding_status_id, af.agreement as agreement_id, af.amp_funding_id as funding_id FROM amp_funding af JOIN amp_funding_detail afd ON afd.amp_funding_id = af.amp_funding_id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value acv ON acv.id = afd.expenditure_class ) v ON aav.amp_activity_id = v.amp_activity_id;
